title: ★Home In Lake Orion For Lease★

4 Beds
2.5 Baths
3100 Square Ft
Welcome home to this beautiful 4 bedroom 2.2 bath colonial in Lake Orion.
Fully finished basement with 1/2 bath, entertaining spaces and projector screen.
Pulte energy efficient construction with all the bells and whistles.
Main floor office and Pulte planning center give you the space you need for at home work space.
Fabulous layout for family and hosting, with a dining room and open concept kitchen & living room.
The kitchen has an abundance of storage, granite counter tops, stainless steel appliances & island seating.
Bright natural light floods the heart of the home.
The second floor offers a large loft space for all to play and gather.
Second floor laundry room is a dream of convenience.
4 large bedrooms with amazing closet space will not disappoint.
Whole home repainted and lovingly cared for.
Expansive brick paver patio and large corner lot gives you the outdoor space you are looking for.
***PETS negotiable.
$250 non refundable cleaning fee, non refundable pet fee if applicable, Rent Spree application $35, $4500 security deposit***

The agent does not guarantee the accuracy of the square footage, lot size, or other information concerning the conditions or features of the property provided by the seller or obtained from public records or other sources.
The buyer is advised to independently verify the accuracy of all information through personal inspection and with appropriate professionals.
